subject: After vid_restart in some cases medic icon appears on scoreboard
description:
The title isn't so obvious so I note cases when this bug happens.

How to reproduce:

Case 1: vid_restart while you are dead and in reinforcement queue

1. Choose any class in-game
2. Get yourself into reinforcement queue in any fashion
3. Do vid_restart
4. Normally it should show next to your name a skull icon indicating that you are dead
5. It shows medic icon for a short while instead of skull icon (see Case1.jpg)

Case 2: vid_restart while you are alive

1. Choose any class in-game
2. Do vid_restart
3. Normally it shouldn't show any short of icon next to your name, but now it shows the medic icon (see Case2.jpg)

-*S
